author: Jeff Elder
title: These are the 14 states where coronavirus cases might flare up next, according to research into social media posts about symptoms, testing, and sick relatives
description: Dataminr, a New York firm that tracks real-time data for the UN and multinational firms, says prior flare-ups of COVID-19 were preceded by a spike in social posts in the affected area. The posts were not opinions about the virus, but firsthand accounts of sym…
content:
On March 27, a man in Tucson, Arizona, posted on Twitter, "Guys. My wife is showing some symptons consistent with covid -19[sic]. Seeing about testing." 
The post is a vulnerable slice of life during the time of coronavirus, but data researchers say it may b… [+5744 chars]
